items.name: Inside Your Mind Wiki
items.title: Inside Your Mind Wiki
items.headline: Welcome to Inside Your Mind Wiki!
items.desc: This is about fanfiction. All about fanfiction. No canon articles allowed because they will be deleted. These articles will come from the mind. But don't like: Tell everyone what your street address is, or cuss or spam or bully on this wiki. This is a way for everyone to communicate using their mind. Everyone will get to learn about your interests and people will socialize with you even if you are not old enough to get an email address/Facebook account. Hope you have fun making the wiki with me!
